PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElectricFlowStorageDeviceTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: The characteristics of the supply associated with an electrical device occurrence acting as a source of supply to an electrical distribution system NOTE: Properties within this property set should ONLY be used in circumstances when an electrical supply is applied. The property set, the properties contained and their values are not applicable to a circumstance where the sypply is not being applied to the eletrical system or is temporarily disconnected. All properties within this property set are considered to represent a steady state situation.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types and no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.IFC4.3.0.0 DEPRECATION The Reference property is deprecated and shall no longer be used, use attribute Name on the relating type instead.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSupplyVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal voltage of the supply.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSupplyVoltageOffset
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum and minimum allowed voltage of the supply e.g. boundaries of 380V/440V may be applied for a nominal voltage of 400V.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal frequency of the supply.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectedConductorFunction
PropertyDef.Definition: Function of the conductors to which the load is connected.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit3PoleMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum 3 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit3PolePowerFactorMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the maximum 3 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit2PoleMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum 2 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit2PolePowerFactorMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the minimum 2 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit1PoleMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum 1 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and N.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit1PolePowerFactorMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the maximum 1 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and N.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit1PoleMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum 1 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and N.

PropertyDef.Name: ShortCircuit1PolePowerFactorMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the minimum 1 pole short circuit current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and N.

PropertyDef.Name: EarthFault1PoleMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum 1 pole earth fault current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and PE/PEN.

PropertyDef.Name: EarthFault1PolePowerFactorMaximumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the maximum 1 pole earth fault current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and PE/PEN.

PropertyDef.Name: EarthFault1PoleMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Minimum 1 pole earth fault current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and PE/PEN.

PropertyDef.Name: EarthFault1PolePowerFactorMinimumState
PropertyDef.Definition: Power factor of the minimum 1 pole earth fault current provided at the point of supply i.e. the fault between 1 phase and PE/PEN.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumInsulatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The max voltage that the insulation would operate normally

PropertyDef.Name: RatedCapacitance
PropertyDef.Definition: Capacitance value determined under specified conditions and declared by the manufacturer.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Power capacity of the equipment
